sentences.english: Safety is the focus in the field of shipping.
sentences.chinese: 安全是航运界关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Speeding up development of Dalian Northeast Asian International Shipping Centre.
sentences.chinese: 加快发展大连东北亚国际航运中心。

sentences.english: In the shop, mechanics prepare the iron grapples — as they're called — for shipping.
sentences.chinese: 在店里，技工们为了他们所谓的航运在准备铁吊斗。

sentences.english: COSCO is today perceived as a model company in China as well as in the world shipping community.
sentences.chinese: 中远在中国和世界航运界已被公认为是公司的典范。

sentences.english: China Container Freight Index has been regarded by international maritime trade realm.
sentences.chinese: 中国出口集装箱运价指数一直受到国际航运界的关注。

sentences.english: Palmer, who created the company Blue Star Line last year, declined to make a similar boast.
sentences.chinese: 去年创立蓝星航运公司的帕尔默不愿夸下这样的海口。

sentences.english: The listening today is from a shipping company.
sentences.chinese: 今天的对话来自航运公司。

sentences.english: The Yangtse River, the longest river in china, is the golden waterway for river transportation.
sentences.chinese: 长江是我国第一大河，是内河航运业的黄金通道。

sentences.english: The glut of shipping capacity has forced down rates.
sentences.chinese: 航运量的供过于求已经造成了利率下滑。

sentences.english: America and Germany do well in inland river navigation.
sentences.chinese: 美国和德国是内河航运强国。

sentences.english: The high speed craft shipping enterprises were far swiftly developed in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国高速船航运事业发展十分迅猛。

sentences.english: But market freight rates had tumbled to under $20 a ton.
sentences.chinese: 而市场航运费率已经跌至不足每吨20美元。

sentences.english: Place international shipping information where experienced users look for it.
sentences.chinese: 广场国际航运信息的用户那里经验丰富的检查。

sentences.english: Shipping companies are ready to explore new routes.
sentences.chinese: 航运公司已作好了探索新航线的准备。

sentences.english: This company has a great reputation in the shipping world.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司在航运界享有很高的声誉。

sentences.english: The fuel will be shipped by a vessel owned by China Shipping Development Co.
sentences.chinese: 燃料将由中国航运发展有限公司装罐运输。

definition: connected by air, sea traffic or service
